resources.string: BookMyParcel
Terms and Condition
1. RATES QUOTED ARE Ex. SAIBABA COLONY COIMBATORE. AT PRESENT APP BOOKING AVAILABLE ONLY FOR COIMBATORE AND OUTSKIRTS AREA.
2. PARCELS ABOVE 3 KG TO 2O Kgs FREE PICK UP FROM SAIBABA COLONY, KK PUDUR, TVS NAGAR, VADAVALLI, R S PURAM, AND NORTH KOVAI.
3. FOR OTHER PLACES AND WEIGHT ABOVE 20 Kgs PICK UP CHARGES WILL BE EXTRA.
4. ACTUAL WEIGHT AND VOLUMETRIC WEIGHT (LXBXH IN Cms Divided BY 4750 = Wt Kgs,) WILL BE MEASURED AND WHICH EVER IS HIGHER WILL BE TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT.
5. PAYMENT SHOULD BE PAID TO THE BOOKING/PICK UP PERSON. BALANCE IF ANY ON RECEIPT OF WAYBILL/CONSIGNMENT NOTE.
DTDC EXPRESS LTD,
Franchise : Shri Sainath Logistics
S B COMPLEX, 157 â€“ N S R ROAD, SAIBABA COLONY,
(OPP.) KANNAN DEPARTMENTAL STORE, / SOUTH INDIAN BANK
COIMBATORE - 641011
1. DTDC Is a 26 years old Courier and Logistics company in India , With 10,000 Channel Partners and having a turnover of 600 crores Per Annum.
2. DTDC has branches in ALL Major TOWNS IN INDIA to give Timely DOOR delivery /Online TRACKING / Delivery UPDATION of your Courier / Parcels and Cargo.
3. DTDC has Value Added Services delivery system to deliver your courier /Parcels in 24 HOURS in METRO and with in 48/72 HOURS in other MAJOR CITIES in NORTH INDIA.
4. DTDC can REVERSE pick up Parcels/ Cargo from PAN INDIA to Coimbatore.
5. DTDC has special SCHEME for CORPORATE clients.
INTERNATIONAL:

DTDC has OWN branches in 26 countries ABROAD and for other Overseas Destinations has TIE UP arrangement with major service providers to offer BEST Rates in Booking / Delivering /Picking -up and Freight Forwarding your COURIER and PARCELS in TIME.
DOTZOT :
Is an arm of DTDC to help E-COMMERCE business to Deliver consignment on "CASH ON DELIVERY" basis.
We Solicit your Enquiry and order to PROVE our COMPETITIVE and Best services.
For quotes /Booking COURIER and PARCELS
